block.p: E7TH.COM, New York, named Jay M. Margolis chairman and chief executive, succeeding Todd Ricci, who remains with the company as chief strategic officer. Mr. Margolis had been chief executive at Esprit de Corp.

E7TH.COM, New York, named Jay M. Margolis chairman and chief executive, succeeding Todd Ricci, who remains with the company as chief strategic officer. Mr. Margolis had been chief executive at Esprit de Corp.
ORINCON CORP., San Diego, named Arthur P. Garner III, chief operating officer, to the additional post of president. He succeeds Daniel Alspach, who remains chairman and chief executive.

TRIANGLE PHARMACEUTICALS, Durham, N.C., named Robert Amundsen Jr. executive vice president and chief financial officer. He had been executive vice president for finance and planning and chief financial officer at Covance Biotechnology Services.
